title: Which ukulele sounds most like a guitar? - Quora

response.answer_text: The baritone ukulele sounds most like a guitar. It is a larger instrument, but will still be higher than a guitar in general. The tuning also matches that of guitar in the four strings match the top four of the guitar. A bass ukulele is essentially the same as a base guitar, though you can get special bass instruments that are much smaller and use very thick strings.

Easily the baritone ukulele. It's the largest of the ukes and is tuned like the top four strings of a guitar in standard tuning (D-G-B-E low to high). Kinda like a small, short scaled tenor guitar with nylon strings and comfortable string spacing.
